price: Kuma suka ce: "Allah Yã riƙi* ɗã." Tsarki yã tabbata a gare Shi! A'a, Shi ne da abin da yake a cikin sammai da ƙasa, dukansu, a gare Shi, mãsu ƙanƙan da kai ne.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَدٗاۗ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥۖ بَل لَّهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ كُلّٞ لَّهُۥ قَٰنِتُونَ
footnotes: * Misãli na biyu Yahũdu na cewa Uzairu ɗãn Allah, kuma Nasãra sunã cewa Ĩsa ɗan Allah, Lãrabãwa na cewa Malã'iku 'ya'yan Allah. Wannan zai hana su jituwa har adãwarsu ga Musulmi ta yi tãsĩri.

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
